messages: too long; don't give a fuck
I'm not fucking reading that
I didn't ask for a fucking essay
bold of you to assume I'd read this shit
nobody's reading all that
absolutely fucking not
that's a lot of words for 'I don't care'
christ, get to the point
brevity is a virtue you clearly lack
too lazy; didn't give a fuck
I have better things to do than read your novel
summarize or fuck off
wall of text? hard pass
my attention span doesn't stretch that far
ain't nobody got time for that
lovely essay, shame I'm not reading it
congratulations on your TED talk, I'm not listening
this could've been an email... wait, it is. still not reading it
impressive word count, zero fucks given
I'd rather watch paint dry
